text: aur unakee qaum (ladako kee aavaaz sunakar bure iraade se) unake paas daudatee huee aaee aur ye log usake qabl bhee bure kaam kiya karate the loot ne (jab unako) aate dekha to kaha ai meree qaum ye maaree qaum kee betiyaan (maujood hain) unase nikaah kar lo ye tumhaareee vaaste jaayaz aur jyaada saaph sutharee hain to khuda se daro aur mujhe mere mehamaan ke baare mein rusava na karo kya tum mein se koee bhee samajhadaar aadamee nahin hai
